name: Reddit Minimal Dark
description:
Simple flat dark grey theme for Reddit.
Recommend disabling subreddit themes in reddit preferences.
additional_info:
October 13, 2018 - Fixed transparent backgrounds in new.reddit.com
April 12, 2018 - Preliminary support for new.reddit.com
January 1, 2018 - Improved upvote/downvote arrow colors, added setting to show/hide subreddits top bar
December 10, 2017 - Improved icon contrast, fixed transparent dialog backgrounds
July 15, 2017 - Improved RES compatibility
April 30, 2017 - Small tweaks
April 23, 2017 - Improved readability, restored missing features, code cleanup
June 19, 2016 - Initial release 1.0

discussions.name: Awesome, but needs to support colored flair
Little problem at the top right corner
Works with default (not old) reddit as of Feb 1 2019

style_setting_options.label: Hide
